meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'tmd_jqcycle'

languageKey.label: jQuery Cycle

Konfiguration
Experts
Use Advanced Configuration. Overwrites configuration completely
Advanced Confuguratin
Pictures
Content Elements
Pictures
Pictures
Image width
Image height
timeout: 4000, // milliseconds between slide transitions (0 to disable auto advance)
speed: 1000, // speed of the transition (any valid fx speed value)
speedIn: 0, // speed of the 'in' transition
speedOut: 0, // speed of the 'out' transition
random: 0, // true for random, false for sequence (not applicable to shuffle fx)
sync: 1, // true if in/out transitions should occur simultaneously
pause: 0, // true to enable "pause on hover"
delay: 0, // additional delay (in ms) for first transition (hint: can be negative)
continuous: 0, // true to start next transition immediately after current one completes
Effekt
